name: POOLdemonium
description:
!!READ ME!! It's pool but without taking turns! Your job is to pot all of the yellow balls by hitting the white cue ball. The computer will try to pot the blue balls using the black cue ball. You can hit your ball at anytime, even when your ball is in motion!

Made for the GameMakers ToolKit GameJam 2018!


By the way, did you like the pun? "POOL"-demonium, like pandemonium; but with pool... Ok never mind.
